text: You make your way down with the elevator. It suddenly breaks and you climb out. You see a security room.
You enter the security-room. There is a door-control-panel and a light switch
You set all the doors to unlocked and leave. You see a door with a green light
You flick the light switch but nothing happens
You enter the door with a green light and see shelves. There's nothing useful on them so you move onto the next room. It has a lab-door and a stairwell
You try the door. It's locked.
You head down the stairwell. There is a door that has a red light and another corridor. You head to the corridor and then to an another one. You climb into the high-voltage-switchboard-area.
You turn on the power for the turbine hall.
You turn on the power to the lab
You check out the lab, cross the electrified and flooded turbine hall, listen to hartman's speech, head trough the sawmill and head to the cave entrance.
